question: You have recently moved to a new flat. Unfortunately, you lost some money the other day, and cannot afford to pay next month's rent which is due.Write a letter to the landlord explaining the situation that you will pay as soon as your parents send the moneyAlso, mention that there are some pridem with the flat.
text: I am writing this letter, in connection to the rent of a flat, which is due  next week.

Last week, I had misplaced my wallet and unfortunately, I had lost all my cash and debit cards in it. Although,I have lodged a request for issuing me a new card to the bank ,however, they have told me that it will take a week to process my request. Till then,I have asked my parents to transfer the money to my account, until then I will not be able to pay my upcoming month rent on time and I assured you that I will clear my dues as soon as I received the money.

Besides,  there are some flaws in the roof of the flat,as water is dripping from it in the kitchen, probably due to leakage in a pipe. you are requested to send a plumber to fix the fault as early as possible.
I hope, you will understand my situation and allow me a grace period for a few days and help me in a tough financial position.
